What is the outlook for Herpes Zoster Oticus ?,"Generally, the prognosis of herpes zoster oticus is good. However, in some cases, hearing loss may be permanent. Vertigo may last for days or weeks. Facial paralysis may be temporary or permanent.",NINDS,Herpes Zoster Oticus
